about_the_game:
Welcome to Alphapoint, the premier online first-person shooter game on Steam featuring low-poly graphics. In this game, players will be transported to a visually stunning world where they will engage in intense multiplayer battles across a variety of maps and game modes.

With a wide selection of weapons and characters, each with their own unique abilities and specialties, players have the freedom to experiment and discover new strategies to take on their opponents. The game's low-poly graphics give it a distinctive and visually appealing aesthetic, while still maintaining a high level of gameplay and realism.

Customization is key in Alphapoint, with a variety of options available for players to personalize their characters, loadouts and in-game environment. Join our dedicated community and compete against players from all around the world in this one-of-a-kind gaming experience. Wishlist Alphapoint on Steam now!
